title: Kang-Koo's Story
overview: A heartaching love story between a man and a woman based in the Port of Gang-gu, Yeongdeok.Kyung Tae travels down to Gang-gu to take care of his dead friend's older sister 'Moon Sook' and nephew 'Kang Koo'. Kyung Tae is a cold-blooded gangster but falls in love with Moon Sook who suffers from a chronic disease. The drama will center around Kyung Tae's blind love for Moon Sook and his will to protect Kang Koo.
